welcome_message_body: Welcome to Collado-Villalba! Enjoy the beautiful mountain views and charming streets, and don't miss out on trying the delicious local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic and Schengen flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for non-Schengen flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights, with a modern design and plenty of amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for long-haul and non-Schengen flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow or unreliable at times.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
